tool_description: API donde podrás ver información e imágenes de todos los capítulos del manga para el famoso shonen de One Piece
title: One Piece Manga

api_list.name: Get Chapter
api_list.description: Retorna capitulo seleccionado del manga  de One Piece
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://one-piece-manga.p.rapidapi.com/chapter/{chapterid}"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "one-piece-manga.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get List Chapters
api_list.description: Lista de todos los capítulos del manga de OnePiece
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://one-piece-manga.p.rapidapi.com/list"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "one-piece-manga.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())
